title: Citibank Thailand Launches First Co-Brand Credit Card with a Supercenter
summary: Bangkok - Savvy shoppers can look forward to the best value-add credit card they can hope for - the Citibank-Big C Visa Platinum credit card.
tag-1: Citibank Thailand Launches First Co-Brand Credit Card with a Supercenter
tag-2: Bangkok – Savvy shoppers can look forward to the best value-add credit card they can hope for – the Citibank-Big C Visa Platinum credit card.
tag-3: A partnership between Citibank, the top credit card issuer in Asia Pacific, and Big C Supercenter, leading retailer operating more than 170 stores in Bangkok and nationwide, the Citibank-Big C Visa Platinum credit card is designed to fulfill every need of smart and discerning shoppers with wide-range of privileges and everyday savings.
tag-4: Launched today, the first Citibank co-branded credit card with a supercenter offers an unprecedented 20 percent cash back in all Big C supercenters to first-time Citibank credit card customers who sign up by March 31. Attractive privileges also await existing Citibank credit card members who apply for this new card.
tag-5: Voralak Tulaphorn, Cards Business Managing Director, Citibank, N.A., said at the launch, "As the leading credit card issuer, Citibank recognizes our customers' diverse lifestyles and constantly develops new products to serve their needs.
tag-6: "The Citibank-Big C Visa Platinum credit card, created in partnership with Big C, is a credit card milestone in Thailand. Accepted in all sections of Big C supercenters including the supermarket, restaurants and tenant shops, it is the only card consumers will need when shopping at Big C. The more one spends, the more one will gain," added Voralak.
tag-7: Regis Prigent, Vice President of Marketing and Communications, Big C Supercenter Plc., said "The Card is Big C's latest innovation under our philosophy to offer customers "more than just low prices" and total shopping satisfaction and convenience."
tag-8: "Big C is the key player in retail industry with 170 stores of all formats nationwide. The 100,000 merchandise varieties in our stores are already priced to maximize customers' savings. With the card, customers can conveniently enjoy even more savings through cash back, privileges and additional savings including at all shops and restaurants inside Big C stores nationwide."
tag-9: "One unique feature of the card is that it provides 'platinum' privileges to all shoppers regardless of income. The more you use the card, the more you save. The card is simply the best companion for shoppers who seek quality and most value for their money," shared Regis.
tag-10: Voralak detailed the Citibank-Big C Visa Platinum's wide range of privileges including:
tag-11: With the comprehensive range of privileges, the Citibank-Big C Visa Platinum is the best card when shopping or dining at Big C Supercenters.
tag-12: The Citibank-Big C Visa Platinum is expected to attract more than 500,000 customers. Sign up today. For more information, contact round-the-clock Citiphone Banking at 1588.
